member.name: R:CrashReporter
member.summary: Crash Reporter us a library used for sending exception reports to the Crash Collector website. See http://github.com/pvginkel/CrashCollector and http://github.com/pvginkel/CrashReporter.NET for more information.

member.name: N:CrashReporter
member.summary: The CrashReporter namespace contains all classes of the Crash Reporter library.
